statements: UPDATE customer_conversations SET platform='Facebook' WHERE conversation_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE social_media_conversations SET platform='Twitter', timestamp='2022-01-15 08:30:00', message='Hello world' WHERE conversation_id='c22b39a0-8f59-4e1f-9250-5fa6445e93b7';

UPDATE CustomerConversations SET message = 'Updated message' WHERE conversation_id = 1;
UPDATE CustomerSocialMedia SET engagement_rate = 0.75, followers_count = 500 WHERE customer_id = 100;

UPDATE CustomerSocialMedia SET engagement_rate = 0.75, followers_count = 5000 WHERE social_media_platform = 'Twitter';
UPDATE CustomerConversations SET message = 'Hello, how can I assist you?' WHERE conversation_id = 12345;
UPDATE CustomerDetails SET email = 'example@gmail.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id = 98765;
UPDATE CustomerConversations SET message = 'New message content', timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE conversation_id = 12345;
UPDATE CustomerDetails SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id = 54321;

UPDATE customer_conversations SET conversation_text = 'Thank you for your feedback!' WHERE customer_id = 101 AND conversation_date = '2022-05-15';
UPDATE customer_feedback SET satisfaction_rating = 4, feedback_text = 'Great service, but can be improved' WHERE feedback_id = 201;
